A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie will thrill you. Then\, days later\, you will figure out it didn't like you. Yes\, you wanted to like it. But perhaps it preferred the critics to the audience. Compare the critics score above to the audience score  -- it's 96% to 48% on Feb 18\, 2018.

And why? Because of two things: story and editing. Tokenism runs amuck. Love polygons abound. Characters act out of character. Everyone puts in a token appearance. Including the hero\, Luke.

Millions of people\, maybe billions\, waited upto 30 years for Luke Skywalker to return. And when he did\, it was as a bitter old uncle who didn't want to spend time with family anymore. :)
